name: Simple City Builder
description:
Pretty basic gameplay. Select building, left click to place, left shift and drag to place multiple, right click to sell buildings for 50% back.

Please let me know if you encounter any bugs! :)

I will be building new features for this game later on.

All proceeds will go towards getting a Steam page for my upcoming game "Urban Gardener Simulator". See this as a sort of Crowdfunding Project.

Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com

Building assets by Karboosx
